metadata.name: !#Astrobirth
metadata.description:
[img=https://i.imgur.com/CYd21ua.png] Astrobirth is a content mod derived from streamer [url=https://www.youtube.com/@아이작오헌영]OHY[/url]'s 1vs1 time attack battles. Experience more thrilling moments with Isaac, including the following features! [list] [*][b]150+ new items[/b] [*][b]30+ glowing planetarium items[/b] [*][b]10+[/b] [strike]seems familiar[/strike] [b]characters[/b] [*]20+ distinctive trinket [*]New machines that'll make your dopamine surge [*]And more! [/list] Discover surprising pickups with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3460799883] Subscribe to [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3460799883]Astro-pockets[/url] and [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3338495603]Golden Item Mode[/url] to enjoy Astrobirth even more!
[h1]Compatibility[/h1] Sorry, there isn't much synergy. But I guarantee it won't conflict with most mods! [list] [*]Repentance+ and Internal Item Description (English) [*][url=https://repentogon.com/]REPENTOGON+[/url](If it's missing, a few items won't work) [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=836319872]External Item Description[/url] (Korean / AI Translation English) [/list]
Report issues : https://github.com/TeamHY/Astrobirth/issues
[h1]Credits[/h1] [list] [*][url=https://www.youtube.com/@아이작오헌영]OHY[/url] (Director/Manager) [*]Pdom (Main Programming) [*]AGF1674 (Arts) [*]sawalk (Graphics/Translation) [*]Heart_bit, Piissii, 리셰 (Special Thanks) [/list]
